title: Create CNN model for MOE/MOP tag feature extraction
description: Create a convolutional neural network that trains on labeled data from the parquet database to learn MOE/MOP tag associations. The model should process embedding columns (columns with 'embedding' in name) and extract features associated with MOE/MOP tags.

title: Create pandas to DuckDB/Parquet conversion script
description: Create a Python script that takes a pandas DataFrame and converts it to a DuckDB database with Parquet storage format. Script should handle schema inference and efficient data transfer.

title: Process n-gram columns for feature extraction
description: Implement feature extraction for n-gram columns: n contiguous words from narrative text. Columns include n-grams from 1-10 (single increments) and 10-100 (increments of 10). Extract features associated with MOE/MOP tags for each n-gram column.

title: Process phrase columns for feature extraction
description: Implement feature extraction for various phrase columns (different types of phrases). Extract features associated with MOE/MOP tags for each phrase column type.

title: Write extracted features back to parquet
description: After CNN feature extraction, insert results back into parquet files as new columns. New columns should be named after the source column that was evaluated (e.g., 'features_from_ngram_5').

title: Publish datalake scripts to GitHub repository
description: Commit and push all datalake scripts to yj07538Johnny/Johnny_AI_ML_LLM_experiments_2024 public repository. Ensure proper documentation and README for the datalake module.
